00069 void BIF_clearTransformOrientation(bContext *C)
00070 {
00071     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00072 
00073     ListBase *transform_spaces = &CTX_data_scene(C)->transform_spaces;
00074     BLI_freelistN(transform_spaces);
00075     
00076     // Need to loop over all view3d
00077     if (v3d && v3d->twmode >= V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM) {
00078         v3d->twmode = V3D_MANIP_GLOBAL; /* fallback to global   */
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00082 static TransformOrientation* findOrientationName(ListBase *lb, const char *name)
00083 {
00084     TransformOrientation *ts= NULL;
00085 
00086     for (ts= lb->first; ts; ts = ts->next) {
00087         if (strncmp(ts->name, name, sizeof(ts->name)-1) == 0) {
00088             return ts;
00089         }
00090     }
00091     
00092     return NULL;
00093 }
00094 
00095 static int uniqueOrientationNameCheck(void *arg, const char *name)
00096 {
00097     return findOrientationName((ListBase *)arg, name) != NULL;
00098 }
00099 
00100 static void uniqueOrientationName(ListBase *lb, char *name)
00101 {
00102     BLI_uniquename_cb(uniqueOrientationNameCheck, lb, "Space", '.', name, sizeof(((TransformOrientation *)NULL)->name));
00103 }
00104 
00105 void BIF_createTransformOrientation(bContext *C, ReportList *reports, char *name, int use, int overwrite)
00106 {
00107     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00108     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00109     TransformOrientation *ts = NULL;
00110     
00111     if (obedit) {
00112         if (obedit->type == OB_MESH)
00113             ts = createMeshSpace(C, reports, name, overwrite);
00114         else if (obedit->type == OB_ARMATURE)
00115             ts = createBoneSpace(C, reports, name, overwrite);
00116     }
00117     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
00118             ts = createBoneSpace(C, reports, name, overwrite);
00119     }
00120     else {
00121         ts = createObjectSpace(C, reports, name, overwrite);
00122     }
00123     
00124     if (use && ts != NULL) {
00125         BIF_selectTransformOrientation(C, ts);
00126     }
00127 }
00128 
00129 TransformOrientation *createObjectSpace(bContext *C, ReportList *UNUSED(reports), char *name, int overwrite)
00130 {
00131     Base *base = CTX_data_active_base(C);
00132     Object *ob;
00133     float mat[3][3];
00134 
00135     if (base == NULL)
00136         return NULL;
00137 
00138 
00139     ob = base->object;
00140     
00141     copy_m3_m4(mat, ob->obmat);
00142     normalize_m3(mat);
00143 
00144     /* use object name if no name is given */
00145     if (name[0] == 0) {
00146         strncpy(name, ob->id.name+2, MAX_ID_NAME-2);
00147     }
00148 
00149     return addMatrixSpace(C, mat, name, overwrite); 
00150 }
00151 
00152 TransformOrientation *createBoneSpace(bContext *C, ReportList *reports, char *name, int overwrite)
00153 {
00154     float mat[3][3];
00155     float normal[3], plane[3];
00156 
00157     getTransformOrientation(C, normal, plane, 0);
00158 
00159     if (createSpaceNormalTangent(mat, normal, plane) == 0) {
00160         BKE_reports_prepend(reports, "Cannot use zero-length bone");
00161         return NULL;
00162     }
00163 
00164     if (name[0] == 0) {
00165         strcpy(name, "Bone");
00166     }
00167 
00168     return addMatrixSpace(C, mat, name, overwrite);
00169 }
00170 
00171 TransformOrientation *createMeshSpace(bContext *C, ReportList *reports, char *name, int overwrite)
00172 {
00173     float mat[3][3];
00174     float normal[3], plane[3];
00175     int type;
00176 
00177     type = getTransformOrientation(C, normal, plane, 0);
00178     
00179     switch (type)
00180     {
00181         case ORIENTATION_VERT:
00182             if (createSpaceNormal(mat, normal) == 0) {
00183                 BKE_reports_prepend(reports, "Cannot use vertex with zero-length normal");
00184                 return NULL;
00185             }
00186     
00187             if (name[0] == 0) {
00188                 strcpy(name, "Vertex");
00189             }
00190             break;
00191         case ORIENTATION_EDGE:
00192             if (createSpaceNormalTangent(mat, normal, plane) == 0) {
00193                 BKE_reports_prepend(reports, "Cannot use zero-length edge");
00194                 return NULL;
00195             }
00196     
00197             if (name[0] == 0) {
00198                 strcpy(name, "Edge");
00199             }
00200             break;
00201         case ORIENTATION_FACE:
00202             if (createSpaceNormalTangent(mat, normal, plane) == 0) {
00203                 BKE_reports_prepend(reports, "Cannot use zero-area face");
00204                 return NULL;
00205             }
00206     
00207             if (name[0] == 0) {
00208                 strcpy(name, "Face");
00209             }
00210             break;
00211         default:
00212             return NULL;
00213             break;
00214     }
00215 
00216     return addMatrixSpace(C, mat, name, overwrite);
00217 }
00218 
00219 int createSpaceNormal(float mat[3][3], float normal[3])
00220 {
00221     float tangent[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f};
00222     
00223     copy_v3_v3(mat[2], normal);
00224     if (normalize_v3(mat[2]) == 0.0f) {
00225         return 0; /* error return */
00226     }
00227 
00228     cross_v3_v3v3(mat[0], mat[2], tangent);
00229     if (dot_v3v3(mat[0], mat[0]) == 0.0f) {
00230         tangent[0] = 1.0f;
00231         tangent[1] = tangent[2] = 0.0f;
00232         cross_v3_v3v3(mat[0], tangent, mat[2]);
00233     }
00234 
00235     cross_v3_v3v3(mat[1], mat[2], mat[0]);
00236 
00237     normalize_m3(mat);
00238     
00239     return 1;
00240 }
00241 
00242 int createSpaceNormalTangent(float mat[3][3], float normal[3], float tangent[3])
00243 {
00244     copy_v3_v3(mat[2], normal);
00245     if (normalize_v3(mat[2]) == 0.0f) {
00246         return 0; /* error return */
00247     }
00248     
00249     /* preempt zero length tangent from causing trouble */
00250     if (tangent[0] == 0 && tangent[1] == 0 && tangent[2] == 0) {
00251         tangent[2] = 1;
00252     }
00253 
00254     cross_v3_v3v3(mat[0], mat[2], tangent);
00255     if (normalize_v3(mat[0]) == 0.0f) {
00256         return 0; /* error return */
00257     }
00258     
00259     cross_v3_v3v3(mat[1], mat[2], mat[0]);
00260 
00261     normalize_m3(mat);
00262     
00263     return 1;
00264 }
00265 
00266 TransformOrientation* addMatrixSpace(bContext *C, float mat[3][3], char name[], int overwrite)
00267 {
00268     ListBase *transform_spaces = &CTX_data_scene(C)->transform_spaces;
00269     TransformOrientation *ts = NULL;
00270 
00271     if (overwrite) {
00272         ts = findOrientationName(transform_spaces, name);
00273     }
00274     else {
00275         uniqueOrientationName(transform_spaces, name);
00276     }
00277 
00278     /* if not, create a new one */
00279     if (ts == NULL) {
00280         ts = MEM_callocN(sizeof(TransformOrientation), "UserTransSpace from matrix");
00281         BLI_addtail(transform_spaces, ts);
00282         strncpy(ts->name, name, sizeof(ts->name));
00283     }
00284 
00285     /* copy matrix into transform space */
00286     copy_m3_m3(ts->mat, mat);
00287 
00288     return ts;
00289 }
00290 
00291 void BIF_removeTransformOrientation(bContext *C, TransformOrientation *target)
00292 {
00293     ListBase *transform_spaces = &CTX_data_scene(C)->transform_spaces;
00294     TransformOrientation *ts;
00295     int i;
00296     
00297     for (i = 0, ts = transform_spaces->first; ts; ts = ts->next, i++) {
00298         if (ts == target) {
00299             View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00300             if (v3d) {
00301                 int selected_index = (v3d->twmode - V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM);
00302                 
00303                 // Transform_fix_me NEED TO DO THIS FOR ALL VIEW3D
00304                 if (selected_index == i) {
00305                     v3d->twmode = V3D_MANIP_GLOBAL; /* fallback to global   */
00306                 }
00307                 else if (selected_index > i) {
00308                     v3d->twmode--;
00309                 }
00310                 
00311             }
00312 
00313             BLI_freelinkN(transform_spaces, ts);
00314             break;
00315         }
00316     }
00317 }
00318 
00319 void BIF_removeTransformOrientationIndex(bContext *C, int index)
00320 {
00321     ListBase *transform_spaces = &CTX_data_scene(C)->transform_spaces;
00322     TransformOrientation *ts= BLI_findlink(transform_spaces, index);
00323 
00324     if (ts) {
00325         View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00326         if (v3d) {
00327             int selected_index = (v3d->twmode - V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM);
00328             
00329             // Transform_fix_me NEED TO DO THIS FOR ALL VIEW3D
00330             if (selected_index == index) {
00331                 v3d->twmode = V3D_MANIP_GLOBAL; /* fallback to global   */
00332             }
00333             else if (selected_index > index) {
00334                 v3d->twmode--;
00335             }
00336             
00337         }
00338 
00339         BLI_freelinkN(transform_spaces, ts);
00340     }
00341 }
00342 
00343 void BIF_selectTransformOrientation(bContext *C, TransformOrientation *target)
00344 {
00345     ListBase *transform_spaces = &CTX_data_scene(C)->transform_spaces;
00346     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00347     TransformOrientation *ts;
00348     int i;
00349     
00350     for (i = 0, ts = transform_spaces->first; ts; ts = ts->next, i++) {
00351         if (ts == target) {
00352             v3d->twmode = V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM + i;
00353             break;
00354         }
00355     }
00356 }
00357 
00358 void BIF_selectTransformOrientationValue(bContext *C, int orientation)
00359 {
00360     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00361     if (v3d) /* currently using generic poll */
00362         v3d->twmode = orientation;
00363 }
00364 
00365 EnumPropertyItem *BIF_enumTransformOrientation(bContext *C)
00366 {
00367     Scene *scene;
00368     ListBase *transform_spaces;
00369     TransformOrientation *ts= NULL;
00370 
00371     EnumPropertyItem global = {V3D_MANIP_GLOBAL, "GLOBAL", 0, "Global", ""};
00372     EnumPropertyItem normal = {V3D_MANIP_NORMAL, "NORMAL", 0, "Normal", ""};
00373     EnumPropertyItem local = {V3D_MANIP_LOCAL, "LOCAL", 0, "Local", ""};
00374     EnumPropertyItem view = {V3D_MANIP_VIEW, "VIEW", 0, "View", ""};
00375     EnumPropertyItem tmp = {0, "", 0, "", ""};
00376     EnumPropertyItem *item= NULL;
00377     int i = V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM, totitem= 0;
00378 
00379     RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &global);
00380     RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &normal);
00381     RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &local);
00382     RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &view);
00383 
00384     if (C) {
00385         scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00386 
00387         if (scene) {
00388             transform_spaces = &scene->transform_spaces;
00389             ts = transform_spaces->first;
00390         }
00391     }
00392         
00393     if (ts)
00394         RNA_enum_item_add_separator(&item, &totitem);
00395 
00396     for (; ts; ts = ts->next) {
00397         tmp.identifier = "CUSTOM";
00398         tmp.name= ts->name;
00399         tmp.value = i++;
00400         RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &tmp);
00401     }
00402 
00403     RNA_enum_item_end(&item, &totitem);
00404 
00405     return item;
00406 }

00408 const char * BIF_menustringTransformOrientation(const bContext *C, const char *title)
00409 {
00410     const char* menu = IFACE_("%t|Global%x0|Local%x1|Gimbal%x4|Normal%x2|View%x3");
00411     ListBase *transform_spaces = &CTX_data_scene(C)->transform_spaces;
00412     TransformOrientation *ts;
00413     int i = V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM;
00414     char *str_menu, *p;
00415     const int elem_size = MAX_NAME + 4;
00416 
00417     title = IFACE_(title);
00418 
00419     str_menu = MEM_callocN(strlen(menu) + strlen(title) + 1 + elem_size * BIF_countTransformOrientation(C), TIP_("UserTransSpace from matrix"));
00420     p = str_menu;
00421     
00422     p += sprintf(str_menu, "%s", title);
00423     p += sprintf(p, "%s", menu);
00424     
00425     for (ts = transform_spaces->first; ts; ts = ts->next) {
00426         p += sprintf(p, "|%s%%x%d", ts->name, i++);
00427     }
00428     
00429     return str_menu;
00430 }
00431 
00432 int BIF_countTransformOrientation(const bContext *C)
00433 {
00434     ListBase *transform_spaces = &CTX_data_scene(C)->transform_spaces;
00435     TransformOrientation *ts;
00436     int count = 0;
00437 
00438     for (ts = transform_spaces->first; ts; ts = ts->next) {
00439         count++;
00440     }
00441     
00442     return count;
00443 }
00444 
00445 void applyTransformOrientation(const bContext *C, float mat[3][3], char *name)
00446 {
00447     TransformOrientation *ts;
00448     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00449     int selected_index = (v3d->twmode - V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM);
00450     int i;
00451     
00452     if (selected_index >= 0) {
00453         for (i = 0, ts = CTX_data_scene(C)->transform_spaces.first; ts; ts = ts->next, i++) {
00454             if (selected_index == i) {
00455                 
00456                 if (name)
00457                     strcpy(name, ts->name);
00458                 
00459                 copy_m3_m3(mat, ts->mat);
00460                 break;
00461             }
00462         }
00463       }
00464 }
00465 
00466 static int count_bone_select(bArmature *arm, ListBase *lb, int do_it) 
00467 {
00468     Bone *bone;
00469     int do_next;
00470     int total = 0;
00471     
00472     for (bone= lb->first; bone; bone= bone->next) {
00473         bone->flag &= ~BONE_TRANSFORM;
00474         do_next = do_it;
00475         if (do_it) {
00476             if (bone->layer & arm->layer) {
00477                 if (bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00478                     bone->flag |= BONE_TRANSFORM;
00479                     total++;
00480                     do_next= 0; // no transform on children if one parent bone is selected
00481                 }
00482             }
00483         }
00484         total += count_bone_select(arm, &bone->childbase, do_next);
00485     }
00486     
00487     return total;
00488 }
00489 
00490 void initTransformOrientation(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
00491 {
00492     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00493     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00494     Object *obedit = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00495 
00496     switch(t->current_orientation) {
00497     case V3D_MANIP_GLOBAL:
00498         unit_m3(t->spacemtx);
00499         strcpy(t->spacename, "global");
00500         break;
00501 
00502     case V3D_MANIP_GIMBAL:
00503         unit_m3(t->spacemtx);
00504         if (gimbal_axis(ob, t->spacemtx)) {
00505             strcpy(t->spacename, "gimbal");
00506             break;
00507         }
00508         /* no gimbal fallthrough to normal */
00509     case V3D_MANIP_NORMAL:
00510         if (obedit || (ob && ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
00511             strcpy(t->spacename, "normal");
00512             ED_getTransformOrientationMatrix(C, t->spacemtx, (v3d->around == V3D_ACTIVE));
00513             break;
00514         }
00515         /* no break we define 'normal' as 'local' in Object mode */
00516     case V3D_MANIP_LOCAL:
00517         strcpy(t->spacename, "local");
00518         
00519         if (ob) {
00520             copy_m3_m4(t->spacemtx, ob->obmat);
00521             normalize_m3(t->spacemtx);
00522         }
00523         else {
00524             unit_m3(t->spacemtx);
00525         }
00526         
00527         break;
00528         
00529     case V3D_MANIP_VIEW:
00530         if (t->ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00531             RegionView3D *rv3d = t->ar->regiondata;
00532             float mat[3][3];
00533 
00534             strcpy(t->spacename, "view");
00535             copy_m3_m4(mat, rv3d->viewinv);
00536             normalize_m3(mat);
00537             copy_m3_m3(t->spacemtx, mat);
00538         }
00539         else {
00540             unit_m3(t->spacemtx);
00541         }
00542         break;
00543     default: /* V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM */
00544         applyTransformOrientation(C, t->spacemtx, t->spacename);
00545         break;
00546     }
00547 }
00548 
00549 int getTransformOrientation(const bContext *C, float normal[3], float plane[3], int activeOnly)
00550 {
00551     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00552     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00553     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00554     Base *base;
00555     Object *ob = OBACT;
00556     int result = ORIENTATION_NONE;
00557 
00558     normal[0] = normal[1] = normal[2] = 0;
00559     plane[0] = plane[1] = plane[2] = 0;
00560 
00561     if (obedit) {
00562         float imat[3][3], mat[3][3];
00563         
00564         /* we need the transpose of the inverse for a normal... */
00565         copy_m3_m4(imat, ob->obmat);
00566         
00567         invert_m3_m3(mat, imat);
00568         transpose_m3(mat);
00569 
00570         ob= obedit;
00571 
00572         if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00573             Mesh *me= ob->data;
00574             BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00575             BMVert *eve;
00576             BMEditSelection ese;
00577             float vec[3]= {0,0,0};
00578             
00579             /* USE LAST SELECTED WITH ACTIVE */
00580             if (activeOnly && BM_select_history_active_get(em->bm, &ese)) {
00581                 BM_editselection_normal(&ese, normal);
00582                 BM_editselection_plane(&ese, plane);
00583                 
00584                 switch (ese.htype)
00585                 {
00586                     case BM_VERT:
00587                         result = ORIENTATION_VERT;
00588                         break;
00589                     case BM_EDGE:
00590                         result = ORIENTATION_EDGE;
00591                         break;
00592                     case BM_FACE:
00593                         result = ORIENTATION_FACE;
00594                         break;
00595                 }
00596             }
00597             else {
00598                 if (em->bm->totfacesel >= 1) {
00599                     BMFace *efa;
00600                     BMIter iter;
00601 
00602                     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00603                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00604                             add_v3_v3(normal, efa->no);
00605                             sub_v3_v3v3(vec,
00606                                         BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(efa)->v->co,
00607                                         BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(efa)->next->v->co);
00608                             add_v3_v3(plane, vec);
00609                         }
00610                     }
00611                     
00612                     result = ORIENTATION_FACE;
00613                 }
00614                 else if (em->bm->totvertsel == 3) {
00615                     BMVert *v1 = NULL, *v2 = NULL, *v3 = NULL;
00616                     BMIter iter;
00617                     float cotangent[3];
00618                     
00619                     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00620                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00621                             if (v1 == NULL) {
00622                                 v1 = eve; 
00623                             }
00624                             else if (v2 == NULL) {
00625                                 v2 = eve;
00626                             }
00627                             else {
00628                                 v3 = eve;
00629 
00630                                 sub_v3_v3v3(plane, v2->co, v1->co);
00631                                 sub_v3_v3v3(cotangent, v3->co, v2->co);
00632                                 cross_v3_v3v3(normal, cotangent, plane);
00633                                 break;
00634                             }
00635                         }
00636                     }
00637 
00638                     /* if there's an edge available, use that for the tangent */
00639                     if (em->bm->totedgesel >= 1) {
00640                         BMEdge *eed = NULL;
00641                         BMIter iter;
00642                         
00643                         BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00644                             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00645                                 sub_v3_v3v3(plane, eed->v2->co, eed->v1->co);
00646                                 break;
00647                             }
00648                         }
00649                     }
00650 
00651                     result = ORIENTATION_FACE;
00652                 }
00653                 else if (em->bm->totedgesel == 1) {
00654                     BMEdge *eed = NULL;
00655                     BMIter iter;
00656                     
00657                     BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00658                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00659                             /* use average vert normals as plane and edge vector as normal */
00660                             copy_v3_v3(plane, eed->v1->no);
00661                             add_v3_v3(plane, eed->v2->no);
00662                             sub_v3_v3v3(normal, eed->v2->co, eed->v1->co);
00663                             break;
00664                         }
00665                     }
00666                     result = ORIENTATION_EDGE;
00667                 }
00668                 else if (em->bm->totvertsel == 2) {
00669                     BMVert *v1 = NULL, *v2 = NULL;
00670                     BMIter iter;
00671 
00672                     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00673                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00674                             if (v1 == NULL) {
00675                                 v1 = eve; 
00676                             }
00677                             else {
00678                                 v2 = eve;
00679                                 
00680                                 copy_v3_v3(plane, v1->no);
00681                                 add_v3_v3(plane, v2->no);
00682                                 sub_v3_v3v3(normal, v2->co, v1->co);
00683                                 break; 
00684                             }
00685                         }
00686                     }
00687                     result = ORIENTATION_EDGE;
00688                 }
00689                 else if (em->bm->totvertsel == 1) {
00690                     BMIter iter;
00691 
00692                     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00693                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00694                             copy_v3_v3(normal, eve->no);
00695                             break;
00696                         }
00697                     }
00698                     result = ORIENTATION_VERT;
00699                 }
00700                 else if (em->bm->totvertsel > 3) {
00701                     BMIter iter;
00702 
00703                     zero_v3(normal);
00704 
00705                     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00706                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00707                             add_v3_v3(normal, eve->no);
00708                         }
00709                     }
00710                     normalize_v3(normal);
00711                     result = ORIENTATION_VERT;
00712                 }
00713             }
00714         } /* end editmesh */
00715         else if (ELEM(obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00716             Curve *cu= obedit->data;
00717             Nurb *nu;
00718             BezTriple *bezt;
00719             int a;
00720             ListBase *nurbs= curve_editnurbs(cu);
00721 
00722             for (nu = nurbs->first; nu; nu = nu->next) {
00723                 /* only bezier has a normal */
00724                 if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00725                     bezt= nu->bezt;
00726                     a= nu->pntsu;
00727                     while (a--)
00728                     {
00729                         /* exception */
00730                         if ((bezt->f1 & SELECT) + (bezt->f2 & SELECT) + (bezt->f3 & SELECT) > SELECT) {
00731                             sub_v3_v3v3(normal, bezt->vec[0], bezt->vec[2]);
00732                         }
00733                         else {
00734                             if (bezt->f1) {
00735                                 sub_v3_v3v3(normal, bezt->vec[0], bezt->vec[1]);
00736                             }
00737                             if (bezt->f2) {
00738                                 sub_v3_v3v3(normal, bezt->vec[0], bezt->vec[2]);
00739                             }
00740                             if (bezt->f3) {
00741                                 sub_v3_v3v3(normal, bezt->vec[1], bezt->vec[2]);
00742                             }
00743                         }
00744                         bezt++;
00745                     }
00746                 }
00747             }
00748             
00749             if (normal[0] != 0 || normal[1] != 0 || normal[2] != 0) {
00750                 result = ORIENTATION_NORMAL;
00751             }
00752         }
00753         else if (obedit->type==OB_MBALL) {
00754 #if 0 // XXX
00755             /* editmball.c */
00756             MetaElem *ml, *ml_sel = NULL;
00757     
00758             /* loop and check that only one element is selected */  
00759             for (ml = editelems.first; ml; ml = ml->next) {
00760                 if (ml->flag & SELECT) {
00761                     if (ml_sel == NULL) {
00762                         ml_sel = ml;
00763                     }
00764                     else {
00765                         ml_sel = NULL;
00766                         break;
00767                     }
00768                 }
00769             }
00770             
00771             if (ml_sel) {   
00772                 float mat[4][4];
00773 
00774                 /* Rotation of MetaElem is stored in quat */
00775                 quat_to_mat4( mat,ml_sel->quat);
00776 
00777                 copy_v3_v3(normal, mat[2]);
00778 
00779                 negate_v3_v3(plane, mat[1]);
00780                 
00781                 result = ORIENTATION_NORMAL;
00782             }
00783 #endif
00784             
00785         }
00786         else if (obedit->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00787             bArmature *arm = obedit->data;
00788             EditBone *ebone;
00789             
00790             for (ebone = arm->edbo->first; ebone; ebone=ebone->next) {
00791                 if (arm->layer & ebone->layer) {
00792                     if (ebone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00793                         float tmat[3][3];
00794                         float vec[3];
00795                         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, ebone->tail, ebone->head);
00796                         normalize_v3(vec);
00797                         add_v3_v3(normal, vec);
00798                         
00799                         vec_roll_to_mat3(vec, ebone->roll, tmat);
00800                         add_v3_v3(plane, tmat[2]);
00801                     }
00802                 }
00803             }
00804             
00805             normalize_v3(normal);
00806             normalize_v3(plane);
00807 
00808             if (plane[0] != 0 || plane[1] != 0 || plane[2] != 0) {
00809                 result = ORIENTATION_EDGE;
00810             }
00811 
00812         }
00813 
00814         /* Vectors from edges don't need the special transpose inverse multiplication */
00815         if (result == ORIENTATION_EDGE) {
00816             mul_mat3_m4_v3(ob->obmat, normal);
00817             mul_mat3_m4_v3(ob->obmat, plane);
00818         }
00819         else {
00820             mul_m3_v3(mat, normal);
00821             mul_m3_v3(mat, plane);
00822         }
00823     }
00824     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
00825         bArmature *arm= ob->data;
00826         bPoseChannel *pchan;
00827         int totsel;
00828         
00829         totsel = count_bone_select(arm, &arm->bonebase, 1);
00830         if (totsel) {
00831             float imat[3][3], mat[3][3];
00832 
00833             /* use channels to get stats */
00834             for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00835                 if (pchan->bone && pchan->bone->flag & BONE_TRANSFORM) {
00836                     add_v3_v3(normal, pchan->pose_mat[2]);
00837                     add_v3_v3(plane, pchan->pose_mat[1]);
00838                 }
00839             }
00840             negate_v3(plane);
00841             
00842             /* we need the transpose of the inverse for a normal... */
00843             copy_m3_m4(imat, ob->obmat);
00844             
00845             invert_m3_m3(mat, imat);
00846             transpose_m3(mat);
00847             mul_m3_v3(mat, normal);
00848             mul_m3_v3(mat, plane);
00849             
00850             result = ORIENTATION_EDGE;
00851         }
00852     }
00853     else if (ob && (ob->mode & (OB_MODE_ALL_PAINT|OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT))) {
00854         /* pass */
00855     }
00856     else {
00857         /* we need the one selected object, if its not active */
00858         ob = OBACT;
00859         if (ob && !(ob->flag & SELECT)) ob = NULL;
00860         
00861         for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
00862             if (TESTBASELIB(v3d, base)) {
00863                 if (ob == NULL) {
00864                     ob= base->object;
00865                     break;
00866                 }
00867             }
00868         }
00869         
00870         if (ob) {
00871             copy_v3_v3(normal, ob->obmat[2]);
00872             copy_v3_v3(plane, ob->obmat[1]);
00873         }
00874         result = ORIENTATION_NORMAL;
00875     }
00876     
00877     return result;
00878 }
00879 
00880 void ED_getTransformOrientationMatrix(const bContext *C, float orientation_mat[][3], int activeOnly)
00881 {
00882     float normal[3]={0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00883     float plane[3]={0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00884 
00885     int type;
00886 
00887     type = getTransformOrientation(C, normal, plane, activeOnly);
00888 
00889     switch (type)
00890     {
00891         case ORIENTATION_NORMAL:
00892             if (createSpaceNormalTangent(orientation_mat, normal, plane) == 0) {
00893                 type = ORIENTATION_NONE;
00894             }
00895             break;
00896         case ORIENTATION_VERT:
00897             if (createSpaceNormal(orientation_mat, normal) == 0) {
00898                 type = ORIENTATION_NONE;
00899             }
00900             break;
00901         case ORIENTATION_EDGE:
00902             if (createSpaceNormalTangent(orientation_mat, normal, plane) == 0) {
00903                 type = ORIENTATION_NONE;
00904             }
00905             break;
00906         case ORIENTATION_FACE:
00907             if (createSpaceNormalTangent(orientation_mat, normal, plane) == 0) {
00908                 type = ORIENTATION_NONE;
00909             }
00910             break;
00911     }
00912 
00913     if (type == ORIENTATION_NONE) {
00914         unit_m3(orientation_mat);
00915     }
00916 }
